subject: [Agents] Implement Overview tab with runtime control and safe operator actions
description:
Intent:
- Provide at-a-glance runtime state and low-risk actions (toggle + discovery prewarm).

Assumptions:
- Runtime toggle stays blocked when  env override is set.

Design + invariants:
- No secret values shown.
- Immediate-save toggle UX only in unlocked mode.

Diff plan:
- src/controllers/DashboardController.php
- src/templates/agents/overview.twig (or canonical equivalent)

Verification:
- Toggle + prewarm actions work with correct flash states and lock behavior.
